Ladies and gentlemen, comrades and conspirators of the common good: We gather today to confront a proposal whose polished veneer hides a Trojan horse for surveillance. The “Black Box Efficiency” Act promises 50 % more productivity, but it delivers that figure at a cost—our collective agency is surrendered to a closed‑source AI that can only be inspected by its creators.

* The loss of trust that will result if we do not counter it.
